trans-unit.source: Defines the abstract base class for binding elements used to create peer resolver objects.
This class defines the abstract base class for all binding elements used to create peer resolver objects.

For specific implementations of this class, please see the documentation for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement>.
Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> class by duplicating the provided <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> object.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> object to copy when creating this class instance.
Creates a peer resolver object with the settings defined on this binding element.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolver"></xref> object that is used to perform peer name to address resolution.
The settings on the peer resolver must be defined on the binding element.
Gets and sets the referral policy for peer resolvers created with binding elements created by implementations of this class.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerReferralPolicy"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the referral policy for peer resolvers created with this binding element.
